abstract: Since becoming Citigroup’s chief executive in December, Vikram S. Pandit has been clearing out the corporate attic of weak businesses and unloading worrisome assets.
snippet: Since becoming Citigroup’s chief executive in December, Vikram S. Pandit has been clearing out the corporate attic of weak businesses and unloading worrisome assets.
lead_paragraph: Vikram S. Pandit is doing some serious spring cleaning at Citigroup.

headline.main: Blue-Light Specials at Citigroup as Its New Chief Plans a Revival
headline.print_headline: Blue-Light Specials at Citigroup As Its New Chief Plans a Revival
